BRAIxMOP 0.1.7
  • Reference

    AI autonomous screening (practical)

    AI_autonomous_screening_practical.Rd

    This scenario is the same as AI_autonomous_screening_ideal except that the AI reader is not allowed to make a final decision. The no-recall episodes are checked by a simulated fourth reader that is based on the performance of the first reader.

    AI_autonomous_screening_practical(
  accession_df,
  reader_df,
  model_pred,
  threshold = 0.05
)

    Arguments

    accession_df

    A data frame; the data frame containing the episodes to be read.

    reader_df

    A data frame; the data frame containing the reader's read.

    model_pred

    A data frame; the data frame containing the model prediction.

    threshold

    A scalar; the threshold for the model prediction.

    Value

    A data frame; the result of the scenario simulation.

    Contents

    Developed by Jackson Kwok.
